name: Paladin
description: A holy warrior bound to a sacred oath.

1.name: Divine Sense
1.description: As an action, detect celestials, fiends, undead, or consecrated and desecrated places within 60 feet a number of times equal to 1 + your Charisma modifier per long rest.

1.name: Lay on Hands
1.description: You have a healing pool equal to five times your paladin level. As an action, restore hit points or cure disease and poison by expending points from the pool.

2.name: Divine Smite
2.description: When you hit with a melee weapon attack, expend a spell slot to deal extra radiant damage, starting at 2d8 for a 1st-level slot and +1d8 for each higher level (max 5d8, or 6d8 against fiends and undead).

2.name: Fighting Style
2.description: Adopt a fighting style to specialize your combat prowess.

2.name: Spellcasting
2.description: You prepare and cast paladin spells using Charisma as your spellcasting ability and can use a holy symbol as a focus.

3.name: Sacred Oath
3.description: Choose an oath, granting oath spells and features at 3rd, 7th, 15th, and 20th level.

3.name: Channel Divinity
3.description: Use divine energy to fuel magical effects granted by your oath. Regain uses after a short or long rest.

3.name: Channel Divinity: Harness Divine Power
3.description: (Optional) As a bonus action, expend Channel Divinity to regain a spent spell slot of a level up to half your proficiency bonus (rounded up).

4.name: Ability Score Improvement
4.description: Increase one ability score by 2 or two scores by 1, or take a feat if allowed.

4.name: Martial Versatility
4.description: (Optional) Whenever you gain an Ability Score Improvement, you can replace a fighting style you know with another.

5.name: Extra Attack
5.description: You can attack twice whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

6.name: Aura of Protection
6.description: While conscious, you and friendly creatures within 10 feet gain a bonus to saving throws equal to your Charisma modifier.

7.name: Sacred Oath Feature
7.description: Your chosen oath grants a feature at this level.

8.name: Ability Score Improvement
8.description: Increase one ability score by 2 or two scores by 1, or take a feat if allowed.

10.name: Aura of Courage
10.description: You and friendly creatures within 10 feet can't be frightened while you are conscious.

11.name: Improved Divine Smite
11.description: Your melee weapon attacks deal an extra 1d8 radiant damage.

12.name: Ability Score Improvement
12.description: Increase one ability score by 2 or two scores by 1, or take a feat if allowed.

14.name: Cleansing Touch
14.description: As an action, end one spell on yourself or a willing creature you touch. Uses equal to your Charisma modifier per long rest.

15.name: Sacred Oath Feature
15.description: Your chosen oath grants a feature at this level.

16.name: Ability Score Improvement
16.description: Increase one ability score by 2 or two scores by 1, or take a feat if allowed.

18.name: Aura Improvements
18.description: The range of your Aura of Protection and Aura of Courage increases to 30 feet.

19.name: Ability Score Improvement
19.description: Increase one ability score by 2 or two scores by 1, or take a feat if allowed.

20.name: Sacred Oath Feature
20.description: Your chosen oath grants its final feature at this level.
